text: yudevvangen samaharek (dharma) vadan (evaye arthayan) venas vana se perala harina atara, (nabiye! obata “oba kiyu dæyata) api savan dunnemu. ehet api (eyata) venaskam karannemu” (yayi pavasa obage) dharmayehi væradi kimata “(nabiye! metek) obata æsimata nohæki dæya oba asanu” yayida pavasa rayina yayi muva æda kara, edadavannaha. (rayina yana vacanayata arabi basin “apata udav karanu (salakanu) mænava!” yayi arthaya ve. ehet yudevvange basin nam, “modaya!” yayi arthaya ve. ebævin me andamata ovun nokiya, e venuvata ovun obata “nabiye! oba kiyu dæyata) api savan dunnemu. (obata) api avanata vunemu. (api kiyana dæya) oba asanu” (yayi kiya rayina yana vacanaya venuvata) unlurna (apava adarayen yutuva balanu mænava!)” yayida pavasa tibune nam, eya ovuntama itamat hondak vasayenda, rju ekak vasayenda tikhennata tibuni. ehet ovunge pratiksepaye hetuven allah ovunva sapa kara hæriyeya. ebævin (ovunge) samahareku hæra, (vædi deneku) visvasavantayin vannema næta
